## All metadata

```{r}
metadata %>%
  select(-c(FileID, date, ellipse, SampleID, sizeFactor, replaceable)) %>%
  DT::datatable( 
    colnames = c('Group', 'Individual', 'Timepoint', 'Group ID'),
    rownames = TRUE,
    filter = 'top')
```
